country.name: South Africa
country.overview: South Africa is a country on the southernmost tip of the African continent, marked by several distinct ecosystems. Inland safari destination Kruger National Park is populated by big game. The Western Cape offers beaches, lush winelands around Stellenbosch and Paarl, craggy cliffs at the Cape of Good Hope, forest and lagoons along the Garden Route, and the city of Cape Town, beneath flat-topped Table Mountain.

translations.name: អាហ្វ្រិកខាងត្បូង
တောင်အာဖရိကနိုင်ငံ
Kéyah Naakai Łizhinii Bikéyah Shádiʼááhjí Siʼánígíí
ประเทศแอฟริกาใต้

geography.location_description: Southern Africa, at the southern tip of the continent of Africa
geography.area_note: slightly less than twice the size of Texas
geography.climate: mostly semiarid; subtropical along east coast; sunny days, cool nights
geography.terrain: vast interior plateau rimmed by rugged hills and narrow coastal plain
geography.notes: South Africa completely surrounds Lesotho and almost completely surrounds Swaziland
